org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact

Class ContactConstraintSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.dynamics.contact.ContactConstraintSolver

  • public class ContactConstraintSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an impulse based rigid Body physics collision resolver.

    This class uses the method from Box2d called Sequential Impulses. SI, for short, is an iterative method of obtaining a global solution to a number of contacts. A global solution must be found to facilitate stable stacking of rigid Bodys.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.5
    Author:
    William Bittle
    See Also:
    Box2d
